org.scilab.modules.scinotes
Class ScilabContext

java.lang.Object
  org.scilab.modules.scinotes.ScilabContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.text.ViewFactory
public class ScilabContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.text.ViewFactory

The class ScilabContext provides a context to render a Scilab's document.
